resources.string: Informatics has everything you need for a world-class education. From better equipment and facilities to a more conducive environment, Informatics gives you the edge.

The Informatics Group, listed on the mainboard of the Stock Exchange of Singapore was established in 1983, and is a multinational corporation providing lifelong learning services in information technology and business management.
Informatics presently has a global network spanning more than 50 countries, offering programs from O/A Levels (for international students) to undergraduate and post-graduate degree completions.
We are the preferred and leading educational institution offering IT-empowered courses that produces globally competitive individuals who can be innovators of the world.
